1530010.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530010.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530010
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 1
1530010.text: The report is not like witnessing.

1530020.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530020.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530020
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 2

1530030.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530030.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530030
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 3
1530030.text: A Muslim is a mirror of the Muslim.

1530040.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530040.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530040
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 4
1530040.text: Someone whose advice is sought is in a position of trust.

1530050.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530050.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530050
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 5
1530050.text: The person guiding (someone) to do a good deed, is like the one performing the good deed.

1530060.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530060.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530060
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 6
1530060.text: Seek help for any needs discreetly.

1530070.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530070.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530070
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 7
1530070.text: Protect yourself from the fire even with a part of a date.

1530080.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530080.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530080
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 8
1530080.text: The world is the believer’s prison and the disbeliever’s paradise.

1530090.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530090.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530090
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 9

1530100.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530100.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530100
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 10
1530100.text: The word of the believer is like seizing of the hand.

1530110.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530110.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530110
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 11
1530110.text: It is unlawful for a believer to sever relations with his brother for more than three days.

1530120.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530120.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530120
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 12
1530120.text: He is not one of us who cheats us.

1530130.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530130.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530130
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 13
1530130.text: A little that suffices is better than an abundance that distracts.

1530140.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530140.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530140
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 14
1530140.text: Someone who takes back his gift is like someone who eats his vomit.

1530150.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530150.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530150
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 15

1530160.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530160.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530160
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 16
1530160.text: People are like the teeth of a comb.

1530170.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530170.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530170
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 17
1530170.text: Richness lies in the richness of the soul.

1530180.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530180.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530180
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 18
1530180.text: The felicitous person takes lessons from (the actions of) others.

1530190.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530190.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530190
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 19
1530190.text: Indeed, in poetry there is wisdom and in eloquence there is magic.

1530200.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530200.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530200
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 20
1530200.text: The king’s pardon preserves the kingdom.

1530210.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530210.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530210
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 21
1530210.text: A man will be with whom he loves.

1530220.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530220.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530220
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 22
1530220.text: A man who knows his worth will not be ruined.

1530230.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530230.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530230
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 23
1530230.text: The child belongs to the bed and stoning is for the adulterer.

1530240.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530240.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530240
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 24
1530240.text: The upper hand is superior to the lower hand.

1530250.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530250.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530250
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 25
1530250.text: He does not thank Allah who does not thank people.

1530260.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530260.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530260
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 26
1530260.text: Your love of something can blind and deafen (you).

1530270.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530270.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530270
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 27
1530270.text: Hearts are predisposed to love someone who does them good and detest someone who does them harm.

1530280.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530280.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530280
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 28
1530280.text: One who repents from sin is like someone without sin.

1530290.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530290.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530290
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 29
1530290.text: The person who actually witnesses an (event) sees that which one who is absent does not.

1530300.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530300.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530300
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 30
1530300.text: If the nobleman of a people comes to you, honour him.

1530310.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530310.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530310
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 31
1530310.text: False oaths lay waste to home (lands).

1530320.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530320.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530320
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 32
1530320.text: Whoever is killed attempting to save his property is a martyr.

1530330.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530330.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530330
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 33

1530340.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530340.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530340
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 34
1530340.text: The leader of a people is their servant.

1530350.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530350.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530350
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 35
1530350.text: The best of affairs is that which is balanced.

1530360.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530360.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530360
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 36
1530360.text: O Allah, bless my nation in its early rising on Thursdays!

1530370.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530370.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530370
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 37
1530370.text: Poverty can almost turn into disbelief.

1530380.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530380.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530380
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 38
1530380.text: Travelling is a portion of punishment.

1530390.book: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
1530390.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530390
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 39
1530390.text: The best of provision is God-Consciousness (taqwa).

1530400.reference:
Reference  : Forty Hadith Collections 1530400
